languages.text: Несколько снаряженных команд отправились на поиски неизвестной твари, проникшей на борт корабля. Все они, за исключением двух, вернулись ни с чем — единственным их приобретением стали седые волосы и жуткие истории о странных вещах, которые творятся в Пятом Погрузочном. Одна команда позже вернулась со странным трофеем, якобы найденным за проломленной переборкой. Последний отряд больше никто и никогда не видел.

Several armed teams left to search for the unknown creature that had invaded the vessel. All but two returned with nothing to show for it but hair turned prematurely grey and horror stories of what was happening in Loading Bay 5. One team brought back a bizarre trophy allegedly found behind a shattered bulkhead. The last team was never seen or heard from again.
languages.original_text: Несколько снаряженных команд отправились на поиски неизвестной твари, проникшей на борт корабля. Все они, за исключением двух, вернулись ни с чем — единственным их приобретением стали седые волосы и жуткие истории о странных вещах, которые творятся в Пятом Погрузочном. Одна команда позже вернулась со странным трофеем, якобы найденным за проломленной переборкой. Последний отряд больше никто и никогда не видел.

traits.locale_text: Several armed crews left to search for the unknown creature that invaded the vessel. All except two returned empty-handed, their hair turned grey because of what they say was happening in Loading Bay Five. One brought back a bizarre trophy allegedly found behind a shattered bulkhead. Nobody ever saw or heard from the last crew.

Several armed crews left to search for the unknown creature that invaded the vessel. All except two returned empty-handed, their hair turned grey because of what they say was happening in Loading Bay Five. One brought back a bizarre trophy allegedly found behind a shattered bulkhead. Nobody ever saw or heard from the last crew.

Several armed teams left to search for the unknown creature that had invaded the vessel. All but two returned with nothing to show for it but hair turned prematurely grey and horror stories of what was happening in Loading Bay Five. One team brought back a bizarre trophy allegedly found behind a shattered bulkhead. The last team was never seen or heard from again.

Several armed teams left to search for the unknown creature that had invaded the vessel. All but two returned with nothing to show for it but hair turned prematurely grey and horror stories of what was happening in Loading Bay Five. One team brought back a bizarre trophy allegedly found behind a shattered bulkhead. The last team was never seen or heard from again.

Several armed teams left to search for the unknown creature that had invaded the vessel. All but two returned with nothing to show for it but hair turned prematurely grey and horror stories of what was happening in Loading Bay Five. One team brought back a bizarre trophy allegedly found behind a shattered bulkhead. The last team was never seen or heard from again.

languages.text: 几支武装小队离开了，寻找入侵飞船的未知生物。两支队伍几乎一无所获，带回来的东西只有队员们转瞬之间变得花白的头发，以及五号装载区域发生的恐怖故事。还有一支队伍带回了一件古怪的战利品，据称是在某个破碎的舱壁后面发现的，而最后一支队伍彻底失去了音信。
languages.original_text: Several armed teams left to search for the unknown creature that had invaded the vessel. All but two returned with nothing to show for it but hair turned prematurely grey and horror stories of what was happening in Loading Bay 5. One team brought back a bizarre trophy allegedly found behind a shattered bulkhead. The last team was never seen or heard from again.

traits.locale_text: 几支武装小队离开了，寻找入侵飞船的未知生物。两支队伍几乎一无所获，带回来的东西只有队员们转瞬之间变得花白的头发，以及五号装载区域发生的恐怖故事。还有一支队伍带回了一件古怪的战利品，据称是在某个破碎的舱壁后面发现的，而最后一支队伍彻底失去了音信。
几支武装小队离开了，寻找入侵飞船的未知生物。两支队伍几乎一无所获，带回来的东西只有队员们转瞬之间变得花白的头发，以及五号装载区域发生的恐怖故事。还有一支队伍带回了一件古怪的战利品，据称是在某个破碎的舱壁后面发现的，而最后一支队伍彻底失去了音信。

languages.text: Varios equipos armados salieron en busca de la criatura desconocida que había invadido la nave. Todos menos dos regresaron sin nada que mostrar, salvo el pelo, que se había vuelto prematuramente gris, e historias de terror sobre lo que estaba ocurriendo en el Muelle de Carga 5. Un equipo trajo un extraño trofeo supuestamente encontrado tras un muro destrozado. No se supo nada más del último equipo.
languages.original_text: Several armed teams left to search for the unknown creature that had invaded the vessel. All but two returned with nothing to show for it but hair turned prematurely grey and horror stories of what was happening in Loading Bay 5. One team brought back a bizarre trophy allegedly found behind a shattered bulkhead. The last team was never seen or heard from again.

traits.locale_text: Varios equipos armados salieron en busca de la criatura desconocida que había invadido la nave. Todos menos dos regresaron sin nada que mostrar, salvo el pelo, que se había vuelto prematuramente gris, e historias de terror sobre lo que estaba ocurriendo en el Muelle de Carga Cinco. Un equipo trajo un extraño trofeo supuestamente encontrado tras un muro destrozado. No se supo nada más del último equipo.

languages.text: 何組かの武装チームが、船に侵入した正体不明の生物を探すために出発した。2組以外は何の成果もなく、そのような歳でもないのに髪は白髪へと変わり、ローディングベイ5で起きた恐怖話を手土産に戻ってきた。1チームは、崩れ落ちた壁の裏側で発見したと言う奇妙な戦利品を持ち帰る。最後のチームは、二度と姿を現すことはなかった。
languages.original_text: Several armed teams left to search for the unknown creature that had invaded the vessel. All but two returned with nothing to show for it but hair turned prematurely grey and horror stories of what was happening in Loading Bay 5. One team brought back a bizarre trophy allegedly found behind a shattered bulkhead. The last team was never seen or heard from again.

何組かの武装チームが、船に侵入した正体不明の生物を探すために出発した。2組以外は何の成果もなく、そのような歳でもないのに髪は白髪へと変わり、ローディングベイ5で起きた恐怖話を手土産に戻ってきた。1チームは、崩れ落ちた壁の裏側で発見したと言う奇妙な戦利品を持ち帰る。最後のチームは、二度と姿を現すことはなかった。

languages.text: Plusieurs escouades sont envoyées à la recherche de la créature non identifiée qui a pénétré dans le vaisseau, mais seules deux d'entre elles sont revenues sans aucune information tangible, à l'exception des visions d'horreur dont tous leurs membres ont été témoins dans la baie de chargement numéro 5, et qui ont fait blanchir prématurément leurs cheveux. L'une des équipes a rapporté un objet étrange qui aurait été découvert derrière une cloison fracassée. Quant à la dernière équipe, plus personne n'en a entendu parler.
languages.original_text: Several armed teams left to search for the unknown creature that had invaded the vessel. All but two returned with nothing to show for it but hair turned prematurely grey and horror stories of what was happening in Loading Bay 5. One team brought back a bizarre trophy allegedly found behind a shattered bulkhead. The last team was never seen or heard from again.

traits.locale_text: Plusieurs escouades sont envoyées à la recherche de la créature non identifiée qui a pénétré dans le vaisseau, mais seules deux d'entre elles sont revenues sans aucune information tangible, à l'exception des visions d'horreur dont tous leurs membres ont été témoins dans la baie de chargement numéro 5, et qui ont fait blanchir prématurément leurs cheveux. L'une des équipes a rapporté un objet étrange qui aurait été découvert derrière une cloison fracassée. Quant à la dernière équipe, plus personne n'en a entendu parler.

languages.text: Mehrere bewaffnete Teams wurden losgeschickt, um die unbekannte Kreatur zu finden, die in das Schiff eingedrungen war. Bis auf zwei Teams kehrten alle mit leeren Händen zurück, dafür mit grauen Haaren und fürchterlichen Geschichten darüber, was in Ladebucht 5 vor sich ging. Ein Team kehrt mit einer bizarren Trophäe zurück, die es angeblich hinter einem zerstörten Schott gefunden hatte. Das letzte Team wurde nie wieder gesehen.
languages.original_text: Several armed teams left to search for the unknown creature that had invaded the vessel. All but two returned with nothing to show for it but hair turned prematurely grey and horror stories of what was happening in Loading Bay 5. One team brought back a bizarre trophy allegedly found behind a shattered bulkhead. The last team was never seen or heard from again.

Bis auf zwei Teams kehrten alle mit leeren Händen zurück, dafür mit grauen Haaren und fürchterlichen Geschichten darüber, was in Ladebucht 5 vor sich ging. Ein Team kehrt mit einer bizarren Trophäe zurück, die es angeblich hinter einem zerstörten Schott gefunden hatte. Das letzte Team wurde nie wieder gesehen.

languages.text: Silahlı ekipler, gemiye sızan yaratığı aramaya gönderildi. Ekiplerden ikisi haricindekiler, bir anda kırlaşmış saçları ve 5. Yükleme Bölmesi'nde yaşanan korkunç olaylara dair hikâyeleri haricinde bir şey sunamadı. Bir ekip, parçalanmış bir bölme panelinin ardında bulduklarını iddia ettikleri tuhaf bir ganimetle döndü. Son ekip ise kayboldu ve onlardan bir daha haber alınamadı.
